creator: Alexander.Nesterov@Arcadia.spb.ru
text:
The documentation contains the following description about "inheritall" 
attribute of <subant> task: "inheritall: Corresponds to <ant>'s inheritall 
attribute". By default the value of "inheritall" attribute of <ant> task is 
"true". On the other hand it's "false" for <subant> task by default. It should 
be either described in documentation or the default value on "inheritall" 
attribute of <subant> should be "true".
